item.title: MIUI V13.1.3.0.SKXINXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Pad 5 India
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 5 India

Codename: nabu

Version: V13.1.3.0.SKXINXM | 12.0

Size: 3.8 GB

MD5: fcca4ad8fca7712d0318a919e07a40b9

[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 12
Updated Android Security Patch to October 2022. Increased system security.

Optimization: Home screen layout adjustments: 6×4 for horizontal orientation and 4×6 for vertical orientation
